name: HERO BURGER
description:
Endless food runner.
What is it like to be a HERO? What about a HERO BURGER? Be a burger and save your food friends in Hero Burger.

WASD or Arrow keys to move!

Made with Godot for Ludum Dare 47:
https://ldjam.com/events/ludum-dare/47/hero-burger

Theme: Stuck in a loop
